# Configure Revenue Amortization Method

Learn how to add a custom option to the Revenue Amortization Method setting.

To add a custom option for the Revenue Amortization Method setting, do the following:

1.  Navigate to the Revenue Amortization Method section.
2.  Click the Add New button.
    A new row is displayed for you to add a custom option.

3.  In the Field Value column of the new row, enter an option name for the new custom option that you want to add. ![Configure Revenue Amortization Method](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/21b6777a-7cc0-4399-8ace-7d339b456bac?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..HE_jvBjgg3_4CIWVQRNGNfVseBRMu3WyeKyANb37aqM)
4.  Ensure the Active column in the new row is ticked so the new custom option is active.
5.  Click the ![Tick icon](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/24e1fc93-4131-4dd9-89f1-6160369450f1?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..2KvP8G8XDzI2umZAE2kkLfolLgpcD5bM5CFWVJd6FHk) icon in the Actions column to save the new option.
6.  Click Save in the dialog box to confirm the addition.

The custom option is included. You cannot edit, deactivate, or remove a custom option.
